description: famille rose tea caddy and cover; rectangular with canted angles on four moulded bracket feet; cell pattern reserved with quatrefoil floral cartouches and gilt lotus; front with black boar crest in a trefoil panel; crest is probably that of Harper
dimension: H.4-3/8 x W.2-3/4 x D.2-3/8 in. (overall)
title: Teapoy
